title: A Bolognese sauce worth waiting for
ingredients: ['450g lean minced steak', '2 (400g) tins chopped tomatoes', '1 large onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic, crushed', '1 each large red, green and yellow peppers, chopped', '1 tablespoon dried Italian herbs', '1 teaspoon salt', 'freshly ground pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon olive oil']
